Race.SpecificTitle: Labadieville Gravity Drainage Dist. No. 3 -- $0.35 Acreage Tax - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Labadieville Gravity Drainage District No. 3 Proposition
(Acreage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Labadieville Gravity Drainage District No. 3 of Assumption Parish, Louisiana (the "District") continue to levy and collect annually for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028 (an estimated $2,100 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the acreage tax for an entire year), an acreage tax or forced contribution, not to exceed thirty-five cents (.35) per acre, on each and every acre of land in said District for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and operating gravity drainage works in the District?
